mapper.sql: select shop_idx, shop_name, shop_address, shop_number, shop_oper, shop_enternum, shop_lat, shop_long,total_cnt, web_address from shop
mapper.insert:
SELECT shop_seq.nextVal From dual
INSERT INTO shop(shop_idx, shop_name,shop_address,shop_number, shop_oper,shop_enternum,shop_lat,shop_long,total_cnt,web_address) VALUES(#{shopIdx},#{shopName},#{shopAddress},#{shopNumber},#{shopOper}, #{shopEnternum},#{shopLat},#{shopLong},#{totalCnt},#{webAddress})
mapper.update: UPDATE shop SET shop_enternum = shop_enternum+1 WHERE shop_idx=#{shopIdx}
